short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy access to your favorite streamers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mark streamers as favorite to quickly view them in the sidebar on twitch.tv, or in the extension's pop up. Also add streams to Watch Later to save VoDs!

1.2.3
- improved authorization
- improved caching for channels tab

1.2.2
- fixed watch later button

1.2.1
- fixed context menu opening when clicking

1.2.0
- added Context Menu to streams on twitch.tv
  - can access vods and add to watch later much easier
- better organization
- easier to authenticate
- better performance

1.1.6
- better error handling and caching

1.1.5
- more layout fixes

1.1.4
- fixed sidebar disappearing due to twitch.tv layout change

1.1.3
- fixed random "}" in short titles

1.1.2
- server improvements
- fixed watch later not saving when adding stream from channel you don't follow

1.1.1
- various improvements

1.1
- added search bar for easier finding
- fixed 'show all' capping at 100 streamers

1.0.6
- more improvements to controls on twitch.tv website
-  fixed Watch Later button on twitch.tv vods not working 

1.0.5
- fixed buttons for favorite, watch later, and vods on twitch.tv website not appearing

1.0.4
- fixed Client ID error 

1.0.3
- better cache systems to save on API requests
- fixed sync issues when loading from save
- authorization improvements

1.0.2

1.0.1
